metadata.title: Convert HEIC to WebP - Free Online Image Converter | Toolaze
metadata.description: Convert HEIC/HEIF images to WebP format instantly. Batch convert up to 100 images. Modern format with superior compression. 100% free.

hero.desc: Convert HEIC to WebP online for free. Simply drop your HEIC images below to convert them to WebP in seconds.

intro.title: Modern Web Format
intro.content: WebP is a modern image format that provides excellent compression and quality. Convert your HEIC images to WebP for better web performance and smaller file sizes.

scenes.title: Web Optimization
scenes.desc: Convert HEIC to WebP for faster website loading.

scenes.title: Mobile Apps
scenes.desc: Reduce app size with WebP format conversion.

faq.a: WebP offers better compression than HEIC while maintaining quality, and has wider browser support.
WebP is supported by all modern browsers and mobile devices.
